text.name: sys_description
text.text: The console was distributed in three versions, using the design of the original systems released in Japan, North America and Europe respectively. While the North American release features an appearance based on the right-angle gray and purple design of the Super NES, the Japan and PAL region releases are modeled after the rounded-edge Super Famicom/PAL Super NES design such as 'it was originally released in these regions. Apart from that, the box contains a simple motherboard emulating the original games identically with the possibility of adding filters.
